description: Contains information about all people in the system including employees, customer contacts, and supplier contacts.

columns.name: PersonID
columns.description: Primary key. Unique identifier for each person.

columns.name: PreferredName
columns.description: Name the person prefers to be called.

columns.name: IsPermittedToLogon
columns.description: Indicates if person can log into the system.

columns.name: IsExternalLogonProvider
columns.description: Indicates if authentication is via external provider.

columns.name: IsSystemUser
columns.description: Indicates if this is a system account rather than a real person.

columns.name: IsEmployee
columns.description: Indicates if the person is an employee of Wide World Importers.

columns.name: IsSalesperson
columns.description: Indicates if the person is a salesperson.

columns.name: CustomFields
columns.description: JSON field for additional custom attributes.

columns.name: OtherLanguages
columns.description: Other languages spoken by the person.

columns.name: LastEditedBy
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.People for last editor.
